name: ABILA JOSEPH

my_business: Gift of the Present specializes in ‘Strategic Corporate Gifting’ which involves crafting and curating gifts to businesses for their prospects, clients, employees, or business partners with specific goals in mind. We ensure a cohesive and branded gifting experience. We believe that corporate gifting should go beyond generic items and embrace the uniqueness of each occasion.
top_product: Unique Gift sets Custom-made mementos Category based gifts Themed gifts Kerala based cultural gifts VIP Gifts
ideal_referral: An ideal referral would be to get connected with an organization looking to do corporate gifts with a difference or looking to make an impact as strategic gifting is my forte. Gift Of The Present curates gifting experiences and solutions that create a 'Wow' factor either by: 1. Connecting the gift with the brand 2. Bringing an emotional touch 3. Sourcing of functional/useful gifts 4. Making the gift look most appealing I am hoping to get connected with companies that are more focused on quality and creativity rather than price. Having said that, we always work around the budget stipulated by the client.
top_problem_solved: 1. Curating gifts that 'Stand Out' 2. Quality is a given! 3. Time Management - In most cases, timing is what is most challenging; clients often come with last-minute requirements such as gifts to give away at their annual meetings to attendees and delegates. Although I prefer to plan in advance and do everything systematically, practically speaking, requirements come in at the 11th hour, which I have been able to accommodate and turn around without any compromise in the quality delivered.
my_favourite_bni_story: I was driving to my BNI offline meeting and saw ads of Shah Rukh Khan as the new brand ambassador of Muthoot Pappachan Group ( Blue Muthoot) on the Metro pillars of Kochi Metro; and I hoped that I could do a gift for him as I have been gifting to all the brand ambassadors of The Muthoot Group (Red Muthoot) i.e. Sri. Amitabh Bachchan, MS Dhoni, Madhuri Dixit etc for the last few years. I decided to make this my specific ask at that meeting and asked to be connected to a top level executive at Muthoot Pappachan Group. Within a few days, my chapter member connected me to the Director of the Group and within a month I handed over some beautifully curated Onam gifts for not only Shah Rukh Khan but also for Vidya Balan and I am currently taking care of all the gifting requirements for the group. This is truly the power and magic of BNI and the law of attraction!

my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favourite stories is about a parent whose son had just been accepted to a university abroad. They were anxious because their bank couldn’t process the tuition fee in time, and the deadline was just days away. Through ExTravelMoney’s marketplace, we quickly connected them to a nearby authorised forex dealer who offered the best exchange rate and could remit the fees on the same day. The relief on the parent’s face — and the gratitude we received later — reminded me why I started this business: to make international payments simple, fast, and stress-free for families and travellers.

name: JANESH NAMBIAR
company_address: Ambattu Mathew Varki Memmorial Building,, Marottichodu, Theikkakara, Edapally,, COCHIN, KERALA, 682024
my_business: AGORA GROUPS is a premier Commercial Exterior and Interior contracting firm based in Ernakulam and Kannur, Kerala. Led by Janesh Nambiar, we specialize in creating beautiful, functional spaces that reflect our clients' unique personalities.
top_product: As an interior contractor, my top product is a comprehensive design and execution service that transforms spaces into functional and aesthetically pleasing environments. This includes: Custom Interior Design: Tailored designs that reflect the client's style and needs. High-Quality Materials: Sourcing and using premium materials for durability and elegance. Space Planning: Efficient layouts that optimize functionality and flow. Renovation Services: Complete renovations that breathe new life into existing spaces. Project Management: Overseeing the entire process to ensure timely and budget-friendly execution.
ideal_referral: An ideal referral for me as an interior contractor is someone who values good design, is willing to collaborate on their vision, understands the importance of budget while investing in quality, appreciates clear and consistent communication, is flexible with ideas as the project evolves, and seeks to build a lasting partnership for future projects.
top_problem_solved: In my recent project, we transformed an old building into a modern 4-star hotel. We faced several challenges, including outdated layouts, limited natural light, and the need to update the space while keeping its historical character. To tackle these issues, we took a smart approach: Space Analysis: We carefully examined the existing layout to find ways to improve it. This helped us redesign the space to make it more functional. Creative Design: We mixed modern design elements with the building’s original features. This way, we created a beautiful blend of old and new. Natural Light: To bring in more light, we added larger windows and opened up common areas, making the hotel feel bright and welcoming. Smart Technology: We included smart technology for energy efficiency and better guest experiences, like automated lighting and climate control. Team Collaboration: We kept open communication with architects, engineers, and stakeholders, ensuring everyone was on the same page.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favorite BNI story centers around the journey of creating a new partnership firm. Within just two years, we transformed our vision into reality, establishing ourselves as a leading interior contracting firm in Kerala. Through BNI, I connected with like-minded professionals who shared invaluable insights and referrals. These relationships not only helped us secure projects but also fostered collaboration that elevated our designs. The support and networking opportunities within BNI were instrumental in our rapid growth, allowing us to showcase our unique style and commitment to quality. This experience taught me the power of community and collaboration, and I’m proud of the impact we’ve made in the industry.
